title: All I want to do is connect my pixel to a TV without wifi. I have data.
content: We are on a boat without wifi. the hdmi cable I bought doesnt seem to work with a pixel. the chromecast for some reason needs wifi. I just want my tv to mirror what is on my phone. Is there a way or device that can help?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
